text: Ginger and Fred is a 1986 movie. It is about a two dancers who imitate Ginger Rogers and Fred Astaire. The couple is played by Giulietta Masina and Marcello Mastroianni. This movie was released in early 1986. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Federico Fellini Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Ginger and Fred
